cfbscrapR 0.1.4

  • News

Get a teams full roster

cfb_team_roster_data.Rd

Extracts raw game by game data.

cfb_team_roster_data(team)

Arguments

team

Team (Select a valid team, D1 football)

Examples


cfb_team_roster_data("Florida State")
#>          id first_name    last_name weight height jersey year position
